import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Header from "../partials/Header"; import Footer from "../partials/Footer"; import Web3 from "web3"; import * as Icons from "phosphor-react"; let web3; function Dashboard() { const [WalletBalance, setWalletBalance] = useState(""); useEffect(async () => { web3 = new Web3(window.ethereum); await window.ethereum.enable(); web3.eth.getBalance( localStorage.getItem("account"), function (err, result) { if (err) { console.log(err); } else { const balance = web3.utils.fromWei(result, "ether"); setWalletBalance(financial(balance)); console.log(financial(balance)); } } ); }, []); function financial(x) { return Number.parseFloat(x).toFixed(3); } return ( <>
